name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: In Syria, a 5-year-old boy and a 3-year-old girl are engaged. It’s his second marriage and her first.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: This is crazy. He’s almost twice her age. Tickle Me Elmo is the best man.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: They’re very serious in Syria. Maybe that’s where the name comes from.
